item.title: Bit flips with Enums/flags
item.description: TLDR If you can avoid code where an if else flag variable differ by a single bit, do it. Or at least make sure that your code is better at error handling. The following is a hypothetical situation that didn’t happen anywhere and caused no live sites. Details The code was similar to if (str[0] == '0') do_part1(str[1:]) else if (str[0] == '1'): do_part2(str[1:]) else: do_error_handling() If you think ‘0’ and ‘1’ are icky, replace it with an enum flag.
